title: Are These US Soldiers in Syria Crying and Complaining About Trump?
subtitle: A years-old photograph of soldiers at rest was recirculated in October 2019 with criticisms of U.S. President Donald Trump.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows three U.S. soldiers in Syria "crying and visibly shaken saying they could stop this in 10 minutes but Trump won’t let them."
